mapper.select: SELECT ANIMAL_ID, ANIMAL_TYPE, DATETIME, INTAKE_CONDITION, NAME, SEX_UPON_INTAKE FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS ORDER BY ANIMAL_ID ;
SELECT NAME, DATETIME FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS ORDER BY ANIMAL_ID DESC ;
SELECT ANIMAL_ID, NAME FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS WHERE INTAKE_CONDITION = 'Sick' ;
SELECT ANIMAL_ID, NAME FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS WHERE INTAKE_CONDITION <> 'Aged' ORDER BY ANIMAL_ID ;
SELECT NAME FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS ORDER BY DATETIME LIMIT 1 ;
SELECT ANIMAL_TYPE, COUNT(ANIMAL_TYPE) FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS WHERE ANIMAL_TYPE IN ('Cat', 'Dog') GROUP BY ANIMAL_TYPE ORDER BY ANIMAL_TYPE ;
SELECT NAME , COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS WHERE NAME IS NOT NULL GROUP BY NAME HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY NAME ;
SELECT ANIMAL_ID FROM Intakes AS ANIMAL_INS WHERE NAME IS NULL ;
SELECT ANIMAL_ID, NAME FROM ANIMAL_INS WHERE ANIMAL_TYPE = 'Dog' AND NAME LIKE '%EL%' ORDER BY NAME ;
